Package Servlet

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdminViewAuctionListServlet
    AdminViewAuctionListServlet, handles the backend logic for retrieving unapproved auctions
    ApproveDutchAuctionServlet
    ApproveDutchAuctionServlet handles the approve call and redirects back to adminViewAuctionListServlet
    ApproveEnglishAuctionServlet
    ApproveEnglishAuctionServlet handles the approve call and redirects back to adminViewAuctionListServlet
    AuctionListServlet
    AuctionList Servlet, handles the backend logic for AuctionList URL
    BidServlet
    This servlet is used to handle the backend logic of Bidding system.
    BuyOutServlet
    Servlet implementation class BuyOutServlet
    CreateDutchAuctionServlet
    Servlet implementation class CreateDutchAuctionServlet
    CreateEnglishAuctionServlet
    CreateEnglishAuction Servlet, handles the backend logic for CreateEnglishAuction URL
    CreditCardServlet
    Class used to validate and collect the data submitted in credit card servlet
    DutchAuctionServlet
    DutchAuction Servlet, handles the backend logic for DutchAuction URL
    EnglishAuctionServlet
    EnglishAuction Servlet, handles the backend logic for EnglishAuction URL
    ImageRequestServlet
    Servlet implementation class ImageRequestServlet
    LanguageServlet  
    LoginServlet
    Login Servlet to collect the user submitted form data and call various methods to validate the user data.
    LogoutServlet
    Logout Servlet, handles the backend logic for Logout URL
    MailDispatcherServlet
    This servlet runs when the any user logs in and this servlet checks for the ended auctions and calls mail Handler to send the emails to winner and the owner This class extends httpServlet to use the properties of the HttpServlet class
    RegisterServlet
    Register Servlet is used to collect the user submitted form data and call various methods to validate the data.
    RejectDutchAuctionServlet
    RejectDutchAuctionServlet handles the reject call and redirects back to AdminViewAuctionListServlet
    RejectEnglishAuctionServlet
    RejectEnglishAuctionServlet handles the reject call and redirects back to AdminViewAuctionListServlet
    UpdateBidServlet
    UpdateBid Servlet, handles the backend logic for the Ajax on the Dutch Auctions
